instruction:

instruction:

"My opinion is that this is a certain right that is supposed to protect workers.

When you're negotiating and with the State Conciliation and Mediation Officer, this way should not be an option.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
It's completely clear in my mind that this could not have been upheld.

instruction:

I think it's completely clear, in my mind, that people had reached a grey area in that regard," says Ásmundur.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He would therefore not encourage other companies to go the same route as Icelandair.
output: Hann muni þannig ekki tala fyrir því að önnur fyrirtæki fari sömu leið og Icelandair.

instruction:

"Now you also see dangerous talk of how normal it would be to reorganise this system to reduce this right, and I'm completely against that."

instruction:

In Sprengisandur this morning, Ásmundur was also asked about the administration's response to the fire at Bræðraborgarstígur in late June, where three people died.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"I believe the threat is very, very serious," one of them revealed to the German outlet.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

Apart from Russia's energy major Gazprom, which is developing the project, five European companies have joined.

instruction:

output: Fyrr í vikunni samþykkti bandaríska fulltrúaþingið breytingu á lögum um landsvarnir sem ætlað er að útvíkka refsiaðgerðir Bandaríkjanna gegn fyrirtækjum sem taka þátt í uppsetningu hinnar rússnesku Nord Stream 2-gasleiðslu.

instruction:

That this would bring about great value creation which would also create diversity.

Economic development, development that brings in currency, whether in tourism, agriculture, industry or some kind of utilisation of nature, and the nature of government jobs is such that they will provide great support for this development," says Ásmundur.

"More diversity and better support for the nation's resource utilisation and currency income will be created."

I think we should take further steps in this direction."

American reality television star Kenya Moore does good deeds by supporting people in need of IVF.

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
One year later, they had a daughter.

Duhkima (62) and his son Remthangpuia (33) were arrested with the drugs on Friday night from Ngharchhip village, the police said.
output: Duhkima (62) og sonur hans Remthangpuia (33) voru handteknir með fíkniefnin á föstudagskvöld í þorpinu Ngharchhip, sagði lögregla.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
They also dropped about Rs 280 grams of heroin, worth Rs 15 lakh, while swimming across a river as they tried to flee from the police, officials said.
output: Þeir misstu einnig um 280 grömm af heróíni, að andvirði um 1,5 milljónir rúpía, þegar þeir syntu yfir á, á flótta sínum undan lögreglu, að því er fram kom hjá embættinu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
According to police, the seizure was believed to be the biggest heroin haul in the state.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The accused were charged under the relevant sections of the Narcotic Drugs & Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act, 1985.
output: Hinir ákærðu voru sóttir til saka samkvæmt viðeigandi greinum laga um fíkniefni og ofskynjunarlyf (NDPS) frá 1985.

instruction:

instruction:

The Assam Rifles recently seized 25 trucks loaded with betel nuts, valued at Rs 4 crore, being smuggled from Myanmar, they said.

instruction:

instruction:

Lawton is a doctor at the Bradford Royal Hospital and has worked there during the pandemic.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
To disprove the theory about oxygen levels and encourage people to wear a face mask, Lawton decided to run to and from work while wearing a mask.
output: Til þess að afsanna kenninguna um súrefnismettun og til þess að hvetja fólk til að vera með andlitsgrímu ákvað Lawton að hlaupa í vinnuna og aftur til baka með grímu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Before he set off, he started a GoFundMe campaign in support of the Trussell Trust, which donates food in Bradford and other places around the UK.
output: Áður en hann lagði af stað stofnaði hann til söfnunar á GoFundMe fyrir The Trusell Trust sem sér um matargjafir í Bradford og víða um Bretland.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"I'm a great supporter of everything that keeps us safe.
output: „Ég er mikill stuðningsmaður alls þess sem heldur okkur öruggum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
That's why I've been shocked by the falsehood that's been spread about face masks reducing people's oxygen levels," said Lawton.
output: Þess vegna hef ég verið í áfalli yfir röngum upplýsingum sem hafa borist manna á milli um að andlitsgrímur minnki súrefnismettunina hjá fólki,“ sagði Lawton.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Lawton said that he had previously competed in triathlon but that his endurance had been reduced during the pandemic.
output: Lawton sagði að hann hefði áður keppt í þríþraut en á meðan heimsfaraldurinn geisaði hefði þolið hjá honum minnkað.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He ran the 35 kilometres last Monday.
output: Á mánudaginn síðasta hljóp hann kílómetrana 35.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The mask didn't come off at all (no food or drink) and oxygen levels were stubbornly 98% every time I checked," Lawton wrote on Twitter following his run.
output: „Ég tók grímuna aldrei af (enginn matur né drykkur) og súrefnismettunin þrjóskaðist 98% í hvert einasta skipti sem ég kíkti,“ skrifaði Lawton á Twitter að hlaupi loknu.

instruction:

Prince Joachim still in hospital

Prince Joachim has been hospitalised at the Toulouse University Hospital in France and his condition is stable.

"Prince Joachim's condition is still stable.

instruction:

It's been only a few days since the Royal Family celebrated the 18th birthday of Felix, Joachim's second oldest son.

The birthday was celebrated at the Queen's vineyard, Château de Cayx in Cahors in the South of France.

The family was still holidaying there when Joachim was admitted to hospital yesterday.
output: Var fjölskyldan enn þar í fríi þegar Jóakim var lagður inn á spítala í gær.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Last year, 51 year old Joachim moved to France, where he studies at the Ecolé Militaire military academy, the first Dane to do so.
output: Jóakim, sem er 51 árs, fluttist til Frakklands í fyrra þar sem hann er við nám í herskólanum Ecolé Militaire, fyrstur Dana.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He also works as a defence specialist at the Danish embassy in Paris.

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Prince has strong ties to France, both his later father, Prince Henri and his wife, Princess Marie, being French.

Sells the apartment where she has lived for 30 years
output: Selur íbúðina sem hún hefur búið í í 30 ár

Actress Susan Sarandon has put her New York home up for sale.

The building where the apartment is located is in Manhattan's Chelsea neighbourhood and was built before the First World War.

The asking price is USD 7.9 million, or more than one billion Icelandic Krona.

Sarandon and Robbins had Jack and Miles together, and she previously had her daughter, Eva.

All three children grew up in the apartment.

It has six bedrooms, five and a half bathrooms.

The apartment is bright and pleasant with particularly beautiful interiors.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Utah plane crash: A baby and 2 adults are killed in a backyard crash
output: Flugslys í Utah: Barn og tveir fullorðnir létust í brotlendingu í bakgarði

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The crash happened Saturday afternoon when a Piper PA-32 aircraft carrying six people crashed into a backyard in the city of West Jordan, Federal Aviation Administration spokesman Allen Kenitzer said.
output: Sex manns voru um borð í Piper PA-32-flugvél sem brotlenti í bakgarði í borginni West Jordan eftirmiðdegis á laugardaginn samkvæmt Allen Kenitzer, talsmanni Flugmálastjórnar Bandaríkjanna (FAA).

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Three people aboard the plane were killed, including the pilot, identified by police as 43-year-old Lee Wyckoff, his 9-month-old baby, and Milda Shibonis, 36, West Jordan police said.
output: Þrír af þeim sem voru um borð létust, þar á meðal hinn 43 ára gamli flugmaður Lee Wyckoff, 9 mánaða gamalt barn hans og Milda Shibonis, 36 ára, samkvæmt lögregluyfirvöldum í West Jordan.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The pilot's wife is in critical condition, and a 2-year-old child has critical burns.
output: Eiginkona flugmannsins er í lífshættu og 2 ára gamalt barn er með alvarleg brunasár.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
A 12-year-old girl was treated at a local hospital and released, West Jordan Police spokeswoman Jennifer Worthen told CNN on Sunday.
output: 12 ára gömul stúlka var meðhöndluð og útskrifuð af sjúkrahúsi í nágrenninu, sagði Jennifer Worthen, talsmaður lögreglunnar í West Jordan, í samtali við CNN á sunnudaginn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
A 72-year-old woman who was in a house struck by the plane is in critical condition, according to a tweet Sunday from the police department.
output: 72 ára gömul kona sem var í húsi sem varð fyrir flugvélinni er í lífshættu, kemur fram í Twitter-færslu lögregludeildarinnar frá því á sunnudaginn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The crash also damaged three homes, West Jordan city spokesperson Tauni Barker said.
output: Einnig skemmdust þrjú hús í brotlendingunni að sögn Tauni Barker, talsmanns West Jordan-borgar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The cause of the crash has not been determined.
output: Ekki er búið að komast að orsök brotlendingarinnar.

The FAA and National Transportation Safety Board are investigating.
output: Málið er til rannsóknar hjá Flugmálastjórn Bandaríkjanna og Rannsóknarstofnun samgönguslysa (NTSB).

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gottlieb warns uncontrolled coronavirus spread in a community makes it "very hard to open" schools in fall
output: Gottlieb varar við því að skefjalaus útbreiðsla kórónuveirunnar í samfélagi geri það „mjög erfitt“ að skólar opni í haust

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Washington - Dr. Scott Gottlieb, former head of the Food and Drug Administration, warned Sunday it's going to be "very hard" for school districts to open for the upcoming academic year if there is uncontrolled spread of the coronavirus within their communities.
output: Washington – Dr. Scott Gottlieb, fyrrum yfirmaður Matvæla- og lyfjaeftirlits Bandaríkjanna, varaði á sunnudaginn við því að það verði „mjög erfitt“ fyrir skólaumdæmi að opna á nýju námsári ef kórónuveiran dreifir sér skefjalaust innan þessara samfélaga.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"For local school districts, I think they need to be looking at what is the spread within the community.
output: „Ég tel að skólayfirvöld þurfi á hverjum stað fyrir sig að skoða hvernig dreifingin er innan samfélagsins.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
If you have uncontrolled spread within the community, it's going to be very hard to open against that backdrop." Gottlieb said on "Face the Nation."
output: Ef veiran dreifist óhindrað í samfélaginu verður mjög erfitt að opna í því ástandi,“ sagði Gottlieb í „Face the Nation“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
With the fall semester set to begin in the coming weeks, the Trump administration had been urging school districts to open their doors to students for in-person instruction five days a week.
output: Þar sem haustönn á að hefjast á næstu vikum hafði ríkisstjórn Trump hvatt skólayfirvöld til að opna skóla sína fyrir nemendum og bjóða upp á kennslu í skólunum fimm daga í viku.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But the push from President Trump and Education Secretary Betsy DeVos comes as Mr. Trump warned last week the coronavirus crisis will likely "get worse before it gets better" and acknowledged school districts in hot spots may have to delay reopening for a few weeks.
output: Þessar tilraunir Trump forseta og menntamálaráðherrans Betsy DeVos koma þó viku eftir að Trump varaði við því að kórónuveirufaraldurinn myndi líklega „versna áður en hann batnar“ og staðfesti að skólaumdæmi á þeim stöðum þar sem ástandið er verst gætu þurft að fresta opnun skóla um nokkrar vikur.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Still, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention issued guidance Thursday for how best to safely open schools for students.
output: Engu að síður gáfu sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvar út leiðbeiningar á fimmtudaginn um það hvernig öruggast væri að opna skóla fyrir nemendum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The guidance calls for schools to follow social distancing, recommend students and staff wear face coverings, and keep students in defined groups to reduce contact with others, among other guidelines.
output: Í leiðbeiningunum er meðal annars kallað eftir því að í skólum sé fjarlægð milli fólks tryggð, nemendum og starfsfólki ráðlagt að nota andlitsvarnir og að nemendum sé skipt í afmarkaða hópa til að fækka smitleiðum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But the CDC did not provide a benchmark for school administrators on when they should move to close a school in the event of an uptick in coronavirus infections, which Gottlieb said was "unfortunate."
output: En sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvarnar gáfu ekki út viðmið fyrir skólastjórnendur um hvenær þeir ættu að loka skólum ef kórónuveirusmitum fer fjölgandi, sem Gottlieb segir hafa verið „óheppilegt“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"In the setting of uncertainty and the lack of specific guidance for how to keep schools open, I think more parents are going to err on the side of caution," he said.
output: „Þegar þetta óvissuástand ríkir og nákvæmar leiðbeiningar hafa ekki verið gefnar um hvernig skólarnir verða opnaðir held ég að fleiri foreldrar muni fara varlega,“ segir hann.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"That's why it's very important to get specificity out of what the hard metrics are that the CDC didn't do in its guidance."
output: „Þess vegna tel ég mjög mikilvægt að fá nákvæmar upplýsingar um hverir mælikvarðarnir eru nákvæmlega, sem sjúkdómsvarnarmiðstöðvarnar gáfu ekki í leiðbeiningum sínum.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gottlieb said school districts should think about positivity rates in their community, local spread and testing capacity to guide decision-making on whether to keep a school open or shift fully to online learning.
output: Gottlieb sagði skólaumdæmi verða að hugsa um hlutfall jákvæðra smita í samfélaginu, staðbundna útbreiðslu og prófunargetu þegar ákvarðanir eru teknar um hvort halda skuli skólum opnum eða skipta alfarið yfir í kennslu á netinu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
A positivity rate between 5% to 10%, he said, is "starting to get iffy," while above 10% is the "threshold where you really want to think carefully about closing the school districts."
output: Ef á milli 5 til 10% greininga skila jákvæðri niðurstöðu „fer málið að vandast“ en yfir 10% er „þröskuldurinn þegar íhuga þarf vandlega hvort loka skuli skólaumdæmunum.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"That is a sign that there is an epidemic underway inside that community," Gottlieb said, adding that it's going to be difficult for parts of Florida, which is an epicenter of the coronavirus epidemic in the U.S., to open their schools for in-person learning next month.
output: „Þetta er merki um að faraldurinn hafi náð fótfestu í samfélaginu,“ sagði Gottlieb og bætti því við að þetta myndi gera hlutum Flórídaríkis, sem er þungamiðja kórónuveirufaraldursins í Bandaríkjunum, erfitt fyrir að opna fyrir kennslu í skólum í næsta mánuði.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
More than 30 states and the District of Columbia are experiencing an uptick in coronavirus infections, with the epicenter of the epidemic currently in the Sun Belt.
output: Kórónuveirusmitum hefur fjölgað í fleiri en 30 ríki og Kólumbíuhéraði en þungamiðja faraldursins er sem stendur í sólarbeltinu svokallaða við suðurströnd Bandaríkjanna.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But Gottlieb said there are indications cases in some states including Arizona and Texas are beginning to plateau.
output: Gottlieb sagði þó að merki væru um að það væri byrjað að hægja á fjölgun tilfella í sumum ríkjum, þar á meðal Arizona og Texas.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
While Gottlieb said there are "unmistakable signs" the epidemic is slowing in some states across the Sun Belt, it's "heating up" in others, including South Carolina, Alabama, Indiana and Illinois.
output: En þrátt fyrir að Gottlieb hefði sagt að það væru „greinileg merki“ um að það væri farið að hægja á faraldrinum í sumum ríkjum í sólarbeltinu er farið að „hitna í kolunum“ í öðrum, þar á meðal Suður-Karólínu, Alabama, Indíana og Illinois.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Many governors have instituted mandates requiring people to wear masks when they are in public spaces and halted their phased reopenings in an effort to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus.
output: Margir ríkisstjórar hafa sett reglur sem skylda fólk til að nota grímur í almenningsrýmum og stöðvað áfangaskipta enduropnun til að sporna við útbreiðslu kórónuveirunnar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gottlieb said states should consider shutting down bars, limiting the number of people in restaurants, closing movie theaters and other kinds of indoor entertainment venues, and implementing mask mandates to quell the epidemic, steps that allow states to stop short of reverting back to the more stringent restrictions imposed at the start of the pandemic in March.
output: Gottlieb sagði að ríki ættu að íhuga að loka börum, takmarka fjölda fólks á veitingastöðum, loka kvikmyndahúsum og öðrum stöðum sem bjóða upp á skemmtanir innanhúss og setja reglur um grímunotkun til að sigrast á faraldrinum, sem eru aðgerðir sem gera ríkjum kleift að komast hjá því að taka aftur upp þær ströngu takmarkanir sem settar voru í upphafi faraldursins í mars.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In addition to states issuing mask mandates, a number of businesses are requiring customers to wear face coverings as well.
output: Auk þess sem ýmis ríki hafa gert grímunotkun að skyldu hafa ýmis fyrirtæki skyldað fólk til að nota andlitsvarnir.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
McDonald's is among the latest to require face coverings, and the fast food giant joins Walmart, Starbucks and others in implementing their own rules for masks.
output: Skyndibitarisinn McDonald's er nýjasta fyrirtækið til að gera notkun andlitsvarna að skyldu og bætist því í hóp fyrirtækja eins og Walmart, Starbucks og fleiri sem hafa sett eigin reglur um grímunotkun.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gottlieb said he expects more businesses will implement mask mandates in venues, especially those considered high-risk.
output: Gottlieb sagði að hann gerði ráð fyrir því að fleiri fyrirtæki myndu taka upp grímuskyldu hjá sér, sérstaklega þar sem hættan er talin mikil.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"If we really can manage to keep the epidemic under control heading into the winter until we get to a vaccine or some kind of therapeutic that changes the clinical trajectory of this illness, just with masks that's going to be something relatively simple that we can all do that doesn't really change our lives and allows us to maintain what's really important to us like keeping some businesses open, like getting our kids back to school," he said.

Then they jump from the bird and try to find another host when they have to."

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

The link to depression is not coincidental.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Judge denies attempt to stop order requiring release of children in immigration custody
output: Dómari reynir að stöðva úrskurð um að börnum verði hleypt úr haldi innflytjendayfirvalda

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In a Saturday ruling, Judge Dolly Gee appeared to make the upcoming deadline moot by saying that US Immigration and Customs Enforcement doesn't have to release children if the three ways outlined in her previous order can't be met.
output: Í úrskurði sínum á laugardaginn ógildaði dómarinn Dolly Gee væntanleg tímamörk með því að segja að innflytjenda- og tollyfirvöld í Bandaríkjunum þurfi ekki að láta börn laus úr haldi ef ekki er hægt að gera það með einhverri af þeim þremur leiðum sem lýst var í fyrri tilskipun hennar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But Gee also underscored in her order that ICE still has a duty to release children in a timely manner.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Leiðirnar þrjár sem Gee tiltók eru að láta fjölskyldur sem eru í haldi innflytjenda- og tollyfirvalda lausar saman, setja börn í hendur ábyrgðarmanns eða láta fjölskyldur lausar að fengnum alríkisdómsúrskurði.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Shalyn Fluharty, forstöðukona stofnunarinnar Proyecto Dilley sem veitir fjölskyldum í haldi lögfræðiþjónustu, fordæmdi ákvörðunina og sagði hana setja það í hendur innflytjenda- og tollyfirvöldum að ákveða hvort áfram ætti að hafa börn í haldi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The bottom line for me is that kids are detained indefinitely and they have no way out unless ICE agrees to do it or families agree to be separated," Fluharty said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Fjölskyldum er haldið á þremur staðsetningum innflytjenda- og tollyfirvalda í Berks í Pennsylvaníu, Suður-Texas (Dilley) og Karnes-sýslu í Texas.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Börnin á þessum stöðum eru á aldrinum 1 til 17 ára samkvæmt lögmönnum og fulltrúum sem veita lögfræðiaðstoð.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Gee, sem hefur umsjón með framkvæmd Flores-samningsins um umönnun barna í varðhaldi, sagði í júní að þar sem „reglum um grímunotkun og félagsfjarlægð væri ekki eða illa fylgt“ væri áríðandi að flytja börn frá þessum starfsstöðvum.

instruction:

output: Alls hafa meira en 3700 tilfelli verið staðfest í varðhaldi

instruction:

Will consider laws on the independence of board members
output: Mun skoða lagasetningu um sjálfstæði stjórnarmanna

instruction:

instruction:

output: Eftir að Icelandair sleit viðræðum við Flugfreyjufélag Íslands og sagði upp öllum flugfreyjum lýsti stjórn VR því yfir að stjórnarmenn sem VR skipaði í stjórn Lífeyrissjóðs verslunarmanna sniðgengju eða greiddu atkvæði gegn þátttöku lífeyrissjóðsins í væntanlegu hlutafjárútboði Icelandair.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
VR Chairman Ragnar Þór Ingólfsson subsequently said that members of the Board would be replaced if they did not follow these instructions.
output: Ragnar Þór Ingólfsson, formaður VR, sagði í framhaldinu að stjórnarmönnum yrði skipt út ef þeir færu ekki að tilmælunum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:

output: Ásgeir Jónsson, seðlabankastjóri sagði í fréttum RÚV á föstudag að tryggja þyrfti sjálfstæði stjórnarmanna lífeyrissjóða í samþykktum sjóðanna og mögulega með lagabreytingu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Prime Minister Katrín Jakobsdóttir says that the independence of pension fund Board members is important but believes that it is already ensured by law.
output: Katrín Jakobsdóttir forsætisráðherra segir mikilvægt að stjórnarmenn lífeyrissjóða séu sjálfstæðir en telur það nú þegar tryggt með lögum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Now the Central Bank Governor, who is of course the head of the Financial Conduct Authority, under whose authority this is, says that the regulatory environment around this independence should be examined specifically, and we will of course take this under consideration if there is anything that has to be reviewed," she says.
output: „Nú hefur Seðlabankastjóri, sem fer auðvitað með fjármálaeftirlitið, sem hefur með þetta að gera, sagt að það þurfi að skoða sérstaklega regluverkið í kringum þetta sjálfstæði, við að sjálfsögðu munum taka það til skoðunar ef eitthvað þarf að fara yfir þar,“ segir hún.

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

But I think it's natural for such decisions to be made through policy development rather than individual investment decisions," says Katrín.
output: En ég tel eðlilegt að slíkar ákvarðanir séu teknar í gegnum stefnumótun en ekki í gegnum einstaka fjárfestingarákvarðanir,“ segir Katrín.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
There are long lines, sometimes extending to Hellisheiði, for those who want to pass through here on their way to the east of the country and those who are heading west, so it's obvious that we need a new bridge, preferably no later than yesterday," says Árborg's Municipal Council President, Helgi S. Haraldsson.
output: Það eru langar biðraðir, stundum alveg upp á Hellisheiði fyrir þá sem vilja komast hér hjá á leið sinni austur á land og þeir sem eru að koma í vesturátt, þannig að það gefur auga leið að við þurfum að fá nýja brú og eigi síðar en í gær helst,“ segir Helgi S. Haraldsson, forseti bæjarstjórnar í Árborg.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Helgi says that municipal authorities in Árborg recently had a very positive meeting with the head of the Icelandic Road and Coastal Administration and one of its designers.
output: Helgi segir að bæjaryfirvöld í Árborg hafi nýlega átt fund með forstjóra Vegagerðarinnar og hönnuði Vegagerðarinnar og sá fundur hafi verið mjög jákvæður.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"I think it's safe to say that there is more reason to be optimistic about work being done on this than ever before, because there's really something being done, and we should see a tender invitation for a new bridge next autumn."
output: „Ef maður hefur einhvern tímann verið bjartsýnn á að það sé verið að vinna í þessum málum þá held ég að ég geti sagt það núna því að það er virkilega verið að vinna í þessu og við eigum að geta séð að ný brú verði boðið út í haust.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But has Helgi any advice to the drivers stuck in the line at Ölfusá Bridge every day of the summer?
output: En á Helgi einhver ráð til þeirra ökumanna, sem eru í biðröðinni við Ölfusárbrú alla daga yfir sumartímann?

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Yes, you can drive across Þrengsli and through Eyrarbakki to be quicker, but those who are heading east cannot be told to cross Lyngdalsheiði, while those who are heading upcountry should use Mosfellsheiði, Þingvellir and Lyngdalsheiði."
output: „Já, að er hægt að fara þrengslin og í gegnum Eyrarbakka, það flýtir fyrir en þeir sem eru að fara austur á bóginn, það er ekki hægt að benda þeim á að fara Lyngdalsheiðina en þeir sem eru að fara í uppsveitirnar ættu að nota Mosfellsheiði, Þingvelli og Lyngdalsheiði“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Árborg's Municipal Council President, Helgi S. Haraldsson, who calls the traffic jams at Ölfusá Bridge outside Selfoss intolerable.
output: Helgi S. Haraldsson, forseti bæjarstjórnar Árborgar, sem segir umferðarteppunnar, sem myndast við Ölfusárbrú við Selfoss óþolandi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
There are long lines at Ölfusá Bridge every day, with drivers often having to wait for some time before crossing the bridge.
output: Langar biðraðir myndast á hverjum degi við Ölfusárbrú og þurfa ökumenn oft að bíða í töluverðan tíma til að komast yfir brúnna.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In that case, the only thing to do is to draw a deep breath and think positive thoughts.
output: Þá er eina ráðið að draga andann djúpt og hugsa eitthvað jákvætt.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Future of north Brisbane koala habitat site goes to planning court
output: Framtíð heimkynna kóalabjarna í norðurhluta Brisbane fer fyrir skipulagsdóm

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The council said as well as being critical koala, squirrel glider and grey goshawk habitat, it was a key link between Cabbage Tree Creek and Albany Creek bushland corridors.
output: Borgarstjórn sagði að auk þess sem svæðið væri lífsnauðsynleg heimkynni kóalabjarna, svifíkorna og hins gráa gáshauks væri það mikilvægur hlekkur milli náttúrusvæðanna Cabbage Tree Creek og Albany Creek.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The property developers have appealed the council's rejection in the Planning and Environment Court, arguing the development complies with City Plan 2014 legislation, would satisfy an unmet town planning and community need and could "be undertaken without any unacceptable impacts."
output: Framkvæmdaraðilar hafa áfrýjað höfnun borgarstjórnar til dómstóls skipulags- og umhverfismála með þeim rökum að uppbyggingin sé í samræmi við lög um borgarskipulag frá árinu 2014, myndi uppfylla skipulags- og samfélagsþörf sem ekki hefur verið uppfyllt til þessa og „gæti farið fram án óviðunandi áhrifa“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Strong community opposition persists over the proposed development.
output: Mikil andstaða ríkir um þessar fyrirhuguðu framkvæmdir í nærumhverfinu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The developers, while maintaing the proposal is fully compliant with the plan, argue it could be changed to avoid any non-compliance rather than refused.
output: Framkvæmdaraðilarnir halda því fram að þrátt fyrir að tillagan sé að fullu í samræmi við skipulagið væri hægt að breyta henni ef hún uppfyllir ekki kröfur, fremur en að hafna henni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The development as it stands involves several stages, including a service station, childcare centre and 39 townhouses.
output: Eins og er felur framkvæmdin í sér mörg stig, meðal annars þjónustustöð, barnagæslu og 39 íbúðarhús.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
More than 120 public submissions were made during the consultation period, most objecting to the proposal as too big and inappropriate for the site.
output: Opinberar innsendingar voru fleiri en 120 á samráðstíma og flestar mótmæltu þær tillögunni þar sem hún væri of stór og óviðeigandi fyrir svæðið.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
BCC opposition leader Jared Cassidy said the council needed to buy the land to protect koalas.
output: Leiðtogi minnihlutans í borgarstjórn Brisbane sagði að borgin þyrfti að kaupa landið til að vernda kóalabirnina.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"[Lord mayor] Adrian Schrinner needs to stop wasting ratepayer funds in a developer court battle and buy this land to protect Brisbane's wildlife," Cr Cassidy said.
output: „[Borgarstjórinn] Adrian Schrinner þarf að hætta að sóa sjóðum skattgreiðenda í baráttu við framkvæmdaraðila fyrir dómi og kaupa þetta land til að vernda náttúru- og dýralíf Brisbane,“ sagði borgarfulltrúinn Cassidy.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"This is one of the most significant pieces of habitat in the Mountain to Mangroves Corridor and is home to a large koala community."
output: „Þetta eru ein mikilvægustu heimkynni kóalabjarna á náttúrusvæðinu Mountain to Mangroves og þar er fjöldi kóalabjarna.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Cr Schrinner this week said the council wanted to see the koala habitat on the site protected.
output: Schrinner sagði í vikunni að borgarstjórn vildi að heimkynni kóalabjarna á svæðinu yrðu varin.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"We didn't believe the proposal was appropriate for the site," Cr Schrinner said.
output: „Okkur fannst tillagan ekki henta fyrir svæðið,“ sagði Schrinner.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"This, I understand, is now going through a court process and obviously we hope to see out of that court process a good, positive outcome which will see the habitat preserved."
output: „Mér skilst að þetta fari nú í gegnum dómskerfið og augljóslega vonumst við til þess að það leiði af sér góða og jákvæða útkomu sem verður til þess að heimkynnin varðveitast.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Cr Schrinner said koala habitat mapping was a joint responsibility between the council and the state government, with the state government responsible for detailed koala mapping used by local authorities for assessing development applications.
output: Schrinner sagði að kortlagning á heimkynnum kóalabjarna væri sameiginleg ábyrgð borgarstjórnar og ríkisstjórnar, en að ríkisstjórnin bæri ábyrgð á nákvæmum kortum yfir heimkynni kóalabjarna sem staðbundin yfirvöld styðjast við þegar þau taka umsóknir um framkvæmdir til meðferðar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Solskjær: The next step is winning something
output: Solskjær: Næsta skref er að vinna eitthvað

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Man Utd manager Ole Gunnar Solskjær was understandably very happy with the team securing a third-place position in the Premier League today.
output: Ole Gunnar Solskjær, þjálfari Man Utd, var að vonum kampakátur með að liðið hafi tryggt sér þriðja sæti í ensku úrvalsdeildinni í dag.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
This means that the team will play in the UEFA Champions League next season.
output: Liðið mun því leika í Meistaradeild Evrópu á næsta tímabili.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
United needed a draw or win against Leicester today, and the result was a 2-0 victory for the Red Devils.
output: United þurfti jafntefli eða sigur gegn Leicester í dag og var niðurstaðan 2–0 sigur Rauðu djöflanna.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Reaching third place was a great achievement for the players considering how the situation has been during the season.
output: „Frábært afrek hjá leikmönnunum að ná þriðja sæti miðað við hvernig staðan hefur verið á tímabilinu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
I think that me and the boys may have overcome a mental block by winning such a big game, considering our two semi-final losses this season.
output: Ég held að við stákarnir hafi mögulega komist yfir andlegan hjalla með því að vinna svona stórleik, þar sem við höfum tapað tvisvar í undanúrslitum á þessu tímabili.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
We knew that we needed good results today, and now we can begin our next chapter which for these boys means winning titles," added Solskjær, pleased with the victory.
output: Við vissum að við þyrftum úrslit í dag, núna getum við hafið næsta kafla sem er hjá þessum strákum að vinna titla,“ sagði Solskjær sigurreifur.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Manchester United still has a chance to win a title this season, as the team plays in the Europa League in August and has practically secured a spot in the quarter-final.
output: Manchester United á enn möguleika á að vinna titil á þessu tímabili, en liðið leikur í Evrópudeildinni í ágúst og er svo gott sem komið í 8—liða úrslit þar.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Cease-fire in war-torn eastern Ukraine to begin at midnight
output: Vopnahlé hefst á miðnætti í stríðshrjáðri Austur-Úkraínu

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
KYIV, Ukraine -- Ukrainian and rebel forces in war-torn eastern Ukraine have started preparing for a "full and comprehensive" cease-fire scheduled to begin at midnight, a move that officials hope can lead to more steps to resolve the 6-year-old conflict.
output: Kíev, Úkraínu – Úkraínski herinn og andspyrnuöfl í austurhluta Úkraínu undirbúa nú „algjört“ vopnahlé sem á að hefjast á miðnætti og sem fulltrúar vonast til að geti verið fyrsta skrefið í átt að friði eftir átök í 6 ár.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Rebel officials said Sunday they have instructed their troops about the cease-fire and issued a decree banning the use of weapons.
output: Fulltrúar andspyrnuafla sögðu á sunnudag að þeir hefðu gefið hermönnum sínum fyrirmæli um vopnahlé og gefið út tilskipun um bann við notkun vopna.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Ukraine's military said their forces "have begun preparations" for the ceasefire.
output: Úkraínuher sagði sinn herafla hafa „hafið undirbúning“ fyrir vopnahléið.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
If upheld, it would "pave the way for implementing other clauses" of the Minsk peace deal, the office of Ukraine's president said earlier this week, calling the cease-fire a "breakthrough."
output: Ef það nær fram að ganga myndi það „greiða leiðina fyrir framkvæmd annarra ákvæða“ Minsk-friðarsamkomulagsins samkvæmt yfirlýsingu skrifstofu forseta Úkraínu fyrr í vikunni þar sem vopnahléið var kallað tímamótaskref.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Brokered in 2015 by France and Germany, the Minsk peace plan aimed to resolve the conflict between Ukraine and Russia-backed separatists that flared in 2014 after Russia's annexation of Crimea and its support for the separatists.
output: Markmið Minsk-friðarsamkomulagsins, sem gert var árið 2015 fyrir tilstilli Frakklands og Þýskalands, var að leysa úr átökunum milli Úkraínu og aðskilnaðarsinna sem njóta fulltingis Rússlands, en þau átök hófust árið 2014 eftir innlimun Rússlands á Krímskaganum og stuðning landsins við aðskilnaðarsinna.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The conflict has since killed more than 14,000.
output: Meira en 14.000 manns hafa látist í átökunum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The presidents of Russia and Ukraine both commended the cease-fire deal in a phone call Sunday and underscored the importance of implementing the agreements reached at the December summit in Paris.
output: Forsetar Rússlands og Úkraínu fögnuðu báðir vopnahléinu í símtali á sunnudaginn og lögðu áherslu á mikilvægi þess að koma samkomulaginu sem náðist á fundinum í París í desember í framkvæmd.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Russia President Vladimir Putin expressed concern over Kyiv's calls to revise the Minsk agreements and said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's "position about the non-alternative nature of the Minsk agreements, once again voiced during this call, should translate into real actions," the Kremlin said.
output: Vladimír Pútín, Rússlandsforseti, lét í ljós áhyggjur af ákalli Kíev um að Minks-samkomulagið skyldi endurskoðað og sagði að afstaða Volodimírs Selenskij, Úkraínuforseta, um „óbreytanleika Minsk-samkomulagsins, sem hann lét enn á ný í ljós í þessu símtali, ætti að endurspeglast í raunverulegum aðgerðum“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Zelenskiy in turn, stressed the need "for further practical steps" aimed at releasing Ukrainians who are imprisoned by rebels in eastern Ukraine, in the annexed region of Crimea and in Russia, according to a statement by his office.
output: Selenskij lagði hins vegar áherslu á nauðsyn þess að grípa til „frekari aðgerða“ til að frelsa þá Úkraínumenn sem eru fangar uppreisnarmanna í Austur-Úkraínu, á hinum innlimaða Krímskaga og í Rússlandi, samkvæmt yfirlýsingu frá skrifstofu forsetans.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The 2015 deal envisaged that Ukraine can regain control over its border with Russia in the separatist-held regions only after they are granted broad self-rule and hold local elections.
output: Samkvæmt samkomulaginu frá árinu 2015 getur Úkraína aðeins fengið yfirráð yfir landamærum við Rússland á þeim svæðum sem aðskilnaðarsinnar hafa á valdi sínu þegar þau hafa fengið víðtækan sjálfstjórnarrétt og þegar kosningar hafa verið haldnar á svæðunum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The accord helped reduce the scope of hostilities, but Ukrainian forces and the rebels have continued to exchange artillery salvos and gunfire.
output: Samkomulagið dró úr átökum en Úkraínuher og uppreisnarmenn hafa áfram skipst á skotum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In December, the leaders of Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany met in Paris for another round of talks, expressing support for the Minsk deal and agreeing to revive the peace process.
output: Þegar leiðtogar Úkraínu, Rússlands, Frakklands og Þýskalands hittust í París í desember til að eiga aðrar viðræður var látinn í ljós stuðningur við Minsk-samkomulagið og samþykkt að hefja friðarferlið á ný.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Zelenskiy, who won the 2019 election on promises to end the conflict, wanted Ukraine to get control of its border first before local elections, but the Kremlin has insisted the deal should be implemented without revisions.
output: Selenskij, sem vann kosningarnar árið 2019 með loforðum um að binda enda á átökin, vildi að Úkraína fengi yfirráð yfir landamærunum fyrir fyrstu svæðiskosningarnar en stjórnvöld í Kreml krefjast þess að samningurinn verði tekinn til framkvæmda án breytinga.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The new cease-fire deal was reached Wednesday by members of the Tripartite Contact Group that includes representatives of Russia, Ukraine and the Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe, and was welcomed by EU officials.
output: Nýja vopnahléssamkomulagið náðist á miðvikudaginn fyrir tilstuðlan þríhliða samstarfshóps, sem skipaður er fulltrúum Rússlands og Úkraínu auk Öryggis- og samvinnustofnunar Evrópu, og var því fagnað af embættismönnum ESB.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
During his traditional Sunday blessing in St. Peter's Square, Pope Francis also commended the cease-fire, adding that it needed to be put into practice ″to rebuild confidence and lay the foundations for a much needed and long awaited reconciliation with the people.″
output: Við hina hefðbundnu sunnudagsblessun á Péturstorgi minntist Frans páfi einnig á vopnahléið og sagði að það þyrfti að „endurbyggja traust og leggja grunninn fyrir mjög svo nauðsynlega og langþráða sátt við fólkið“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Police: Man fatally shot at protest in Texas
output: Lögreglan: Maður skotinn til bana í mótmælum í Texas

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
AUSTIN, Texas (AP) - A man was fatally shot at a protest in Texas when he approached a vehicle and the driver inside opened fire, police said.
output: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) – Maður var skotinn til bana í mótmælum í Texas þegar hann nálgaðist bíl og ökumaðurinn í bílnum hleypti af vopni sínu, að sögn lögreglu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The shooting happened just before 10 p.m. during a protest in Austin, police spokesperson Katrina Ratliff told reporters early Sunday.
output: Katrina Ratliff, talskona lögreglunnar, sagði fréttamönnum snemma sunnudags að skotárásin hefði átti sér stað rétt fyrir klukkan 22:00 við mótmæli í Austin.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The man was taken to a hospital where he was later pronounced dead.
output: Maðurinn var færður á sjúkrahús þar sem hann var síðar úrskurðaður látinn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The vehicle had honked, turned down a road and then sped toward protesters, witness Michael Capochiano told the Austin American-Statesman.
output: Bíllinn hafði flautað, beygt niður veg og síðan hraðað ferðina í átt að mótmælendum, sagði vitnið Michael Capochiano við blaðið Austin American-Statesman.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The man, who Capochiano said was carrying a rifle, approached the vehicle and was shot by the driver.
output: Maðurinn, sem var með riffil á sér, að sögn Capochiano, nálgaðist ökutækið og var skotinn af ökumanninum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The driver then drove away, Capochiano said.
output: Ökumaðurinn keyrði svo á brott, sagði Capochiano.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Initial reports indicated "the victim may have been carrying a rifle," Ratliff told reporters, adding that the suspect was detained and was cooperating with police.
output: Ratliff sagði fréttamönnum að fyrstu fregnir gæfu til kynna að „fórnarlambið gæti hafa verið með riffil“ og bætti við að hinn grunaði væri í varðhaldi og væri fús til samstarfs við lögreglu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The crowd gathered Saturday for a Black Lives Matter protest, news outlets reported.
output: Samkvæmt fréttastofum hafði hópurinn safnast saman vegna Black Lives Matter-mótmælanna á laugardaginn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The demonstration was streamed live on Facebook and captured audio of a vehicle's horn honking and several gunshots being fired.
output: Mótmælunum var streymt í beinni á Facebook og þar mátti heyra í flautu bílsins og nokkrum skotum sem hleypt var af.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
A torrent of goals in Breiðablik's first win in July
output: Markasúpa í fyrsta sigri Blika í júlí

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Breiðablik won its first league victory since 29 June when the team won ÍA, 5-3, in the Pepsi Max Men's League at Kópavogsvöllur tonight.
output: Breiðablik vann sinn fyrsta deildarsigur frá 29. júní er liðið lagði ÍA að velli, 5—3, í Pepsi Max-deild karla á Kópavogsvelli í kvöld.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Meanwhile, ÍA lost its third league match in a row.
output: Skagamenn tapa aftur á móti sínum þriðja leik í röð í deildinni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
After winning their first three league games, Breiðablik went five matches without a win and had lost three matches in a row before the match against ÍA tonight.
output: Eftir að hafa unnið fyrstu þrjá leiki sína í deildinni lék Breiðablik fimm leiki án þess að fagna sigri og hafði liðið tapað þremur í röð fyrir leikinn við ÍA í kvöld.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
So it was do or die for the Breiðablik team, which began the game with great energy.
output: Það var því að duga eða drepast fyrir Blika sem mættu af miklum krafti inn í leikinn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Alexander Helgi Sigurðarson put the team ahead with a nice finish in the 11th minute after Kristinn Steindórsson had sent him through ÍA's defence.
output: Alexander Helgi Sigurðarson kom liðinu í forystu með laglegri afgreiðslu á 11. mínútu eftir að Kristinn Steindórsson hafði sent hann í gegnum vörn ÍA.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Kristinn doubled the lead six minutes later after a particularly nice assist from the left wing by Gísli Eyjólfsson.
output: Sex mínútum síðar tvöfaldaði Kristinn svo forystuna eftir einkar laglegan undirbúning Gísla Eyjólfssonar af vinstri kantinum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
ÍA couldn't catch a break in the first half, as the home teams' relentless pressure made it enormously difficult for them to connect passes.
output: Skagamenn komust hvorki lönd né strönd í fyrri hálfleiknum þar sem hápressa heimamanna gerði þeim gríðarerfitt fyrir að tengja sendingar saman.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Breiðablik ruled the pitch completely and added their third goal in the 36th minute when Danish player Thomas Mikkelsen scored a header following Höskuldur Gunnlaugsson's corner.
output: Blikar voru með öll völd á vellinum og uppskáru þriðja markið á 36. mínútu þegar Daninn Thomas Mikkelsen skallaði inn hornspyrnu Höskuldar Gunnlaugssonar.

instruction:

instruction:

He had already prepared for a whole year and learnt Icelandic.

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The second lasted only six months.

instruction:

A staff rotation system was subsequently set up, with the idea of Gunter trying out as many people as possible until he found someone he liked.

CBS furthermore claims that Gunter accused embassy staff of acting on behalf of the "Deep State" and undermining his relationship with the State Department in Washington DC.

instruction:

State Department leadership in Washington is said to be well aware of the situation in their Reykjavík embassy, but be reluctant to take charge of the chaos at the embassy in light of Gunter's connections to the White House.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gunter is also said to have had difficulty following orders from the State Department in Washington, and to have refused to return to DC while the Covid-19 pandemic was raging.
output: Einnig er sagt að Gunter hafi átt í erfiðleikum með að fylgja skipunum utanríkisráðuneytisins í Washington, og er hann sagður hafa neitað að snúa til baka til D.C. á meðan Covid-19 faraldurinn geisaði.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He left the embassy in the charge of his staff for many months.
output: Skildi hann sendiráðið eftir í höndum starfsmanna sinna í fleiri mánuði.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He is said to have intended to work remotely from his home in California unless ordered to return by the State Minister himself, Mike Pompeo.
output: Er hann sagður hafa ætlað að vinna frá heimili sínu í Kaliforníu nema skipað af sjálfum utanríkisráðherranum, Mike Pompeo, að snúa aftur.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Finally came back
output: Snéri loks til baka

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Having finally received the order, Gunter returned to Iceland in May.
output: Hafandi loksins fengið skipunina, snéri Gunter til baka til Íslands í maí.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
His new Deputy Chief of Mission, Michelle Yerkin, came to the country this month.
output: Nýr undirmaður hans, Michelle Yerkin, kom svo til landsins í þessum mánuði.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
CBS has not received answers to their enquiries to the US State Department.
output: CBS hefur ekki fengið svör við fyrirspurnum þeirra til bandaríska utanríkisráðuneytisins.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Ministry for Foreign Affairs did not want to offer any comments to CBS, nor to DV's enquiry.
output: Utanríkisráðuneytið vildi ekki tjá sig við CBS, né við fyrirspurn DV.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Gunter is one of many of the Trump administration's politically appointed ambassadors to be noted for their unusual behaviour in recent months.
output: Gunter er einn fjölmargra pólitískt skipaðra sendiherra Trump stjórnarinnar sem hefur vakið athygli fyrir óvenjulega hegðun undanfarna mánuði.

instruction:

Woody Johnson was harshly criticised, for example, when it was revealed that he had attempted to get the British Open moved to a Trump-owned golf course.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The ambassador to South Africa has also been criticised for dismissing her Deputy Chief of Mission and then trying to appoint her son to the post.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
42% of US ambassadors are politically appointed.
output: 42% sendiherra Bandaríkjanna eru pólitískt skipaðir.

instruction:

30% were politically appointed under Obama's government and 32% under George W. Bush's government.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Seattle protesters clash with police over Trump's 'surge' of federal agents plan

instruction:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The sounds of repeated small detonations rang out in the streets of the city in Washington state, and smoke rose from an area where demonstrators had set fire to trailers by a construction site for the youth detention facility.
output: Endurteknir sprengjuhvellir ómuðu um götur Seattle-borgar í Washington-ríki og reykur barst frá staðnum þar sem mótmælendur höfðu borið eld að hjólhýsum á byggingarsvæði við ungmennafangelsið.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Demonstrators slashed car tires and smashed trailer windows.
output: Mótmælendur skáru á bíldekk og brutu glugga í hjólhýsum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Police in riot gear faced off against the demonstrators, some of whom held up umbrellas against falling pellets of pepper spray.
output: Óeirðalögregla beitti sér gegn mótmælendum, sem sumir héldu á lofti regnhlífum til að verjast piparúðahylkjunum sem rigndi yfir þá.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Seattle Times newspaper quoted police as saying 16 people were arrested on suspicion of assault against officers, obstruction and failure to disperse.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Poland to withdraw from European treaty aimed at preventing violence towards women
output: Pólland muni segja sig frá Evrópusamningi um að fyrirbyggja ofbeldi gegn konum

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Poland's right-wing government says it will withdraw from a European treaty aimed at preventing violence against women.
output: Hægriríkisstjórn Póllands segir að landið muni draga sig frá Evrópusamningi um að fyrirbyggja ofbeldi gegn konum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Istanbul Convention is the world's first binding instrument to prevent violence against women but the Polish Justice Minister, Zbigniew Ziobro, described the text as "harmful" because it requires that schools teach children about gender from a sociological point of view.
output: Istanbúlsamningurinn er fyrsti bindandi lagagerningur heims sem hefur það markmið að koma í veg fyrir ofbeldi gegn konum en dómsmálaráðherra Póllands, Zbigniew Ziobro, lýsir textanum sem „skaðlegum“ þar sem hann geri kröfu um að skólar kenni börnum um kyn frá félagsfræðilegu sjónarhorni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Ziobro said over the weekend that on Monday he will begin preparing the formal process to withdraw from the treaty.
output: Ziobro sagði um helgina að á mánudaginn myndi hann byrja að undirbúa formlegt ferli þess að landið segi sig frá samningnum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"This ideological element is linked to the imperative to change education in schools and outside of school programs, in terms of learning, attitudes, convictions of the young Polish generation of students to make, in our opinion, the false assumption that biological sex is archaic, and in fact everything comes down to the socio-cultural gender."
output: „Þessi hugmyndafræðilegi þáttur tengist tilraunum til að breyta menntun í skólum og frístundastarfi, að því er varðar nám, viðhorf og sannfæringu ungrar kynslóðar Pólverja, út frá þeirri ályktun, sem að okkar áliti er röng, að líffræðilegt kyn sé gamaldags og að allt snúist í raun um félagsmenningarlegt kyn.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In Ziobro's opinion, the convention's articles concerning the education of children and young people as well as family relationships in the LGBT context are not acceptable.
output: Ziobro telur að ákvæði samningsins um menntun barna og ungmenna sem og fjölskyldutengsl í samhengi LGBT-fólks vera óviðunandi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"We also reject the LGBT element of promoting family relationships, a view propagated by activists from left-wing or homosexual circles who want to translate their beliefs into binding law," he said.
output: „Við höfnum einnig LGBT-þættinum í umræðunni um fjölskyldutengsl, því þetta er skoðun sem haldið er á lofti af vinstri aktívistum eða hópum samkynhneigðra sem vilja að skoðanir þeirra verði að bindandi lögum,“ sagði hann.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Council of Europe said on Sunday it is "alarmed" that Poland is aiming to withdraw from the Convention.
output: Evrópuráðið sagði á sunnudaginn að það væri „uggandi“ yfir því að Pólland hygðist segja sig frá samningnum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
In Warsaw on Friday, around 2,000 people including women's groups and other rights activists held a demonstration in front of the offices of Ordo Luris, a right-wing organisation that supports withdrawal from the convention.
output: Í Varsjá mótmæltu á föstudaginn um 2000 manns, þar á meðal hópar kvenna og annarra hópa réttindabaráttufólks, fyrir utan skrifstofur hægrisamtakanna Ordo Luris, sem styðja það að landið segi sig frá samningnum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"We will not be victims" they chanted.
output: „Við verðum ekki fórnarlömb,“ kölluðu þau.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Demonstrations were also held in other Polish cities.
output: Mótmæli fóru einnig fram í öðrum borgum í Póllandi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Poland signed the Istanbul Convention for the prevention and combating of violence against women and domestic violence in December 2012 and ratified it in 2015.
output: Pólland undirritaði Istanbúlsamninginn um að fyrirbyggja og berjast gegn ofbeldi gegn konum og heimilisofbeldi í desember 2012 og fullgilti hann árið 2015.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Maurice Petty, Hall of Fame engine builder, dies at 81
output: Maurice Petty, vélsmiður í Heiðurshöllinni, látinn 81 árs

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
KANSAS CITY, Kan.  (AP) - Maurice Petty, part of a stock car racing dynasty that includes father Lee and brother Richard and the first engine builder to be inducted into the NASCAR Hall of Fame, died Saturday.
output: KANSAS CITY, Kansas  (AP) - Maurice Petty, sem var hluti af kvartmílukappakstursveldi sem telur meðal annars föður hans Lee og bróður hans Richard, og sem var fyrsti vélasmiðurinn sem tekinn var inn í Heiðurshöll Nascar, lést á laugardaginn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He was 81.
output: Hann var 81 árs.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Petty's family did not disclose the cause of death.
output: Fjölskylda Pettys gaf ekki upp dánarorsök hans.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
No funeral arrangements have been announced.
output: Ekki hefur verið tilkynnt um útför hans.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
While other family members were acclaimed for their ability behind the wheel, Maurice Petty earned the nickname "The Chief" for his ability to turn a wrench.
output: Á meðan aðrir fjölskyldumeðlimir hans voru rómaðir fyrir hæfileika sína bak við stýrið vann Maurice Petty sér inn gælunafnið „Stjórinn“ fyrir hæfileika sína með skrúflykilinn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He helped his family win 198 races and seven championships in NASCAR's premier series, and he also built engines that carried Hall of Famer Buddy Baker, Jim Paschal and Pete Hamilton to victory.
output: Hann hjálpaði fjölskyldu sinni að vinna 198 kappakstra og sjö titla í úrvalsdeild NASCAR, og smíðaði einnig vélar sem tryggðu Heiðurshallarfélaganum Buddy Baker, Jim Paschal og Pete Hamilton sigur.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The Chief was one of the most talented mechanics in NASCAR history," chairman and chief executive Jim France.
output: „Stjórinn var einn færasti vélvirkinn í sögu NASCAR,“ sagði stjórnarformaðurinn og framkvæmdastjórinn Jim France.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"He provided the power that helped Petty Enterprises define dominance in sports.
output: „Hann kom með kraftinn sem hjálpaði Petty Enterprises að ná yfirburðum sínum á íþróttasviðinu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
While he was known for his work under the hood, Maurice played multiple behind-the-scenes roles, doing what it took to help deliver his cars to victory lane."
output: Þótt Maurice hafi verið þekktur fyrir vinnu sína undir húddinu sinnti hann líka ýmsum hlutverkum á bak við tjöldin og gerði það sem þurfti til að koma bifreiðum sínum á sigurbrautina.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Maurice Petty was born March 27, 1939, in Level Cross, North Carolina.
output: Maurice Petty fæddist 27. mars árið 1939 í Level Cross í Norður-Karólínu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He would tail his father to the track while growing up, and his mechanical know-how soon played an integral part in Lee Petty winning 54 races and three championships.
output: Hann fylgdi föður sínum á kappakstursbrautina þegar hann var lítill og þekking hans í vélvirkjun varð fljótlega veigamikill þáttur í því að landa Lee Petty sigri í 54 keppnum og þremur meistaratitlum.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He made 26 starts in the NASCAR Cup Series from 1960-64, finishing in the top 5 seven times with 16 top-10 runs.
output: Hann keppti 26 sinnum í NASCAR-bikarnum á árunum 1960–64, var sjö sinnum í fimm efstu sætunum og 16 sinnum í þeim 10 efstu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
But he quickly decided to focus on what happened under the hood rather than what happened behind the wheel, and that proved to be a good move for his older brother, who would rely on his engines during his period of dominance.
output: Hann ákvað þó fljótlega að einbeita sér að því sem gerist undir vélarhlífinni frekar en bak við stýrið, sem reyndist heillaspor fyrir eldri bróður hans, sem reiddi sig á vélar hans á sigurgöngu sinni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Richard, who would take on the nickname "The King," won his first championship along with The Chief when he drove a Plymouth to the 1964 title.
output: Richard, sem síðan var kallaður „Kóngurinn“, vann fyrsta meistaratitilinn ásamt Stjóranum árið 1964 með Plymouth-bifreið.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
They won again in 1967, back-to-back titles in 1970 and "71, and added three more before the 1970s drew to an end.
output: Þeir sigruðu aftur 1967, svo tvö ár í röð árin 1970 og 1971, og náðu í þrjá titla í viðbót áður en áttundi áratugurinn var á enda runninn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The seven titles remains tied with Dale Earnhardt and Jimmie Johnson for the most in history.
output: Með þessa sjö titla á bakinu deila þeir metinu í mestum fjölda titla með Dale Earnhardt og Jimmie Johnson.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Maurice Petty was one of the true pioneers in NASCAR who helped build one of NASCAR's dominant teams in Petty Enterprises," Hall of Fame executive director Winston Kelley said in a statement.
output: „Maurice Petty var einn af hinum sönnu brautryðjendum NASCAR og átti á ferli sínum hjá Petty Enterprises þátt í að byggja upp eitt af toppliðunum í NASCAR,“ sagði Winston Kelley í yfirlýsingu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Although the record shows 212 victories, Petty has well over 250 wins to his credit considering all the engines he built for his competitors.
output: „Þótt sigrar Petty séu skráðir sem 212 talsins á hann tilkall til vel yfir 250 sigra, ef teknar eru með allar vélarnar sem hann smíðaði fyrir keppinauta sína.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Chief will forever be remember as one of the best to build power plants in NASCAR."
output: Stjórans verður minnst að eilífu sem eins besta vélsmiðs í sögu NASCAR.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Lee Petty died in 2000 and Maurice Petty's wife of 52 years, Patricia, died in 2014.
output: Lee Petty lést árið 2000 og Patricia, eiginkona Maurice Petty til 52 ára, lést árið 2014.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He also was the uncle of former driver and broadcaster Kyle Petty and Truck Series crew chief Trent Owens.
output: Hann var einnig frændi fyrrverandi ökuþórsins og fjölmiðlamannsins Kyle Petty og Trent Owens, liðsstjóra í pallbílakeppninni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"While we have lost one of NASCAR's true, gritty pioneers and heroes, Maurice Petty's legacy and memory will always be remembered, preserved, celebrated and cherished," Kelley said.
output: „Þótt við kveðjum nú Maurice Petty, einn af hinum sönnu og dugmiklu brautryðjendum og hetjum NASCAR, verður arfleifð hans og nafn geymd í minnum okkar, haldið á lofti og varðveitt um alla framtíð,“ sagði Kelley.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"We offer our sincere condolences to the Petty family."
output: „Við sendum okkar dýpstu samúðarkveðjur til Petty-fjölskyldunnar.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Earned himself" a continued stay in a holding cell
output: „Vann sér inn“ áframhaldandi dvöl í fangaklefa

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Reykjavík Metropolitan Police had its hands quite full today.
output: Lögreglan á höfuðborgarsvæðinu hafði í ýmsu að snúast í dag.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
One of the police's tasks was arresting a man by the police station at Hverfisgata this morning.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"He earned himself a continued stay with the police," reads the police diary.
output: „Hann vann sér inn áframhaldandi dvöl hjá lögreglu,“ segir í dagbók lögreglu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Other police tasks included a notification of assault in Breiðholt between 10 and 11 this morning, which required police to get involved with two men.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Police also had to get involved with a woman in a Kópavogur shopping mall who had eaten there but didn't have money to pay the bill.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Average US gas price up a penny over 2 weeks to $2.25/gallon
output: Meðalbensínverð í Bandaríkjunum hækkar um eitt sent á tveimur vikum upp í 2,25 dali á gallon

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
That's 56 cents below the average pump price from a year ago.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Industry analyst Trilby Lundberg of the Lundberg Survey said Sunday it's the smallest rise in prices seen since late April.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The lowest average is in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, at $1.79 per gallon.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The average price of diesel in the survey taken Friday held steady from two weeks earlier at $2.54 a gallon.

instruction:

instruction:

He said the agency will also alert local fishermen and authorities in neighboring Thailand to assist in the search.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
He didn't provide further details on the boat.

But he said those already in the country will not be sent back out to sea.

instruction:

We should help anyone, whatever their identity, if they are in distress."

"The most important thing for us was to save the driver's life, protect the shipment, and open up the international road," he explained.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Congress Was Already Broken.  The Coronavirus Could Make It Worse.

instruction:

output: „Heimsfaraldurinn einn og sér er ákall til kjörinna fulltrúa okkar um þá forystu og sýn sem við búumst við á erfiðleikatímum,“ segir í skýrslu sem unnin var upp úr viðtalsröð sem haldin var af Leonard Steinhorn, prófessor í samskiptafræðum hjá American University, og Mark Sobol, höfundi og sérfræðingi í skipulagsþróun og stjórnun.

instruction:

"But we are also facing another reckoning, one over our nation's original sin and the racial inequities that have beset our country since its founding."

instruction:

The study ticks through familiar themes when it comes to assessing the sorry state of Congress: the lack of any real across-the-aisle relationships, a schedule that limits opportunities for interaction, too much power concentrated in leadership, constant fund-raising demands, discouragement of bipartisanship, the negative influence of round-the-clock media, the fact that the most important election for lawmakers is often their primary, and the shutting out of minority-party voices.
output: Í rannsókninni er farið yfir kunnugleg efnistök í tengslum við aumkunarvert ástand þingsins: skort á raunverulegum tengslum milli flokka, dagskrá sem takmarkar tækifæri til samskipta, of mikla samþjöppun valds í leiðtogastöðum, sífelldar kröfur um fjáraflanir, úrtölur um samvinnu milli flokka, neikvæð áhrif fjölmiðla sem eru starfræktir allan sólarhringinn, þá staðreynd að mikilvægustu kosningarnar fyrir þingmenn eru oft forkosningar og loks þöggun minnihlutaflokka.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:

output: Ef hugmyndin um fjarfundaþing nær fótfestu væri það alvarlegt bakslag fyrir tilraunir til að auka á samskipti milli flokka, að því er segir í skýrslunni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"Because of the pandemic, Congress was forced to conduct much of its business virtually, and we certainly understand why," the report said.
output: „Heimsfaraldursins vegna neyddist þingið til að færa flesta sína starfsemi yfir á netið og við skiljum vissulega hvers vegna,“ segir í skýrslunni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"But as much as that may have been a necessity, it should not be interpreted as a virtue."
output: „En þrátt fyrir að það hafi verið nauðsyn ætti ekki að túlka slíkt sem dyggð.“

instruction:

They need to learn more about each other's districts, hold civil conversations aimed at finding common ground, build relationships of trust that can lead understanding and solutions."

instruction:

Live series, the esteemed member of the Congressional Black Caucus shared her history and the work ethic and commitment that has brought her to this point, stating, "You all know my history. Ég ólst upp sem dóttir vinnukonu og húsvarðar í Jacksonville, Flórída“.

There's no doubt that regardless of one's political leanings, history will look back on this period as a season of evolution in American politics and perceptions.

instruction:

FDNY diversity official says 'most definitely' OK to exclude white firefighter from color guard

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

output: Þegar hann mætti á athöfnina var honum þó meinað að taka þátt í heiðursverðinum af þáverandi forseta Vulcan-félagsins, Reginu Wilson, því að því er fullyrt er hafði hún beðið um að allir fánaberar við messuna yrðu svartir.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
She then asked McWilliams - a 29-year FDNY veteran - to 'help in a different capacity.'
output: Hún bað síðan McWilliams – 29 ára gamlan starfsmann slökkviliðs New York-borgar – um að aðstoða á annan hátt.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Among those duties was allegedly asking him to escort civilians and muster uniformed officers into formation away from the mass.
output: Á meðal þess sem fullyrt er að hún hafi beðið hann um að gera er að veita óbreyttum borgurum fylgd og stilla einkennisklæddum slökkviliðsmönnum upp fjarri messunni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
McWilliams claimed in his suit that he asked Wilson if she was removing him from the color guard because he's not black.

Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
She confirmed that was the case, he said.
output: Hún staðfesti að það væri svo, sagði hann.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
McWilliams claimed he left the memorial 'to save himself from further shame, humiliation and embarrassment,' as their exchange was overheard by friends and colleagues, the New York Daily News reported.
output: McWilliams fullyrðir að hann hafi yfirgefið minningarathöfnina „til að hlífa sér við frekari skömm, niðurlægingu og smán,“ er vinir og samstarfsfólk heyrðu það sem fór þeim á milli, samkvæmt New York Daily News.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
During her trial testimony, McWilliams' lawyer, Keith Sullivan, asked Loving - who is black - 'So, a request for an all-black color guard is not discriminatory?'
output: Þegar Loving, sem er svört, bar vitni fyrir rétti spurði lögmaður McWilliams, Keith Sullivan, hana að eftirfarandi: „Þannig að það að biðja um að allir séu svartir í heiðursverði er ekki mismunun?“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
'No, it isn't,' Loving said, according to the New York Post.

output: Loving útskýrði að það væri í lagi að skipta hvítum einstaklingi út fyrir svartan einstakling til að „hefja upp sérstöðu okkar og mismunandi uppruna til að skapa stolt, samstöðu og stuðning hvert fyrir annað“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
McWilliams first filed his racial bias complaint with the FDNY in January 2018.

instruction:

instruction:

Threatened a pedestrian and demanded money

instruction:

output: Of lítið er kennt af ástralskri sögu.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:

instruction:

Angler 'seen throwing beer bottle at seal' in Devon

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Myndir sem teknar voru við Hope's Nose nærri Torquay virðast sýna mann á kletti sem kastar hlut í átt að dýri.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Duncan Kenny, sem tók myndirnar, sagði gráa selinn hafa verið að veiðum þegar stangveiðimaðurinn tæmdi úr flösku og kastaði henni í bak dýrsins.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Mr Kenny called it "appalling and inconsiderate behaviour."

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

output: Hann sagðist hafa verið að tína upp rusl á þessum fallega stað í Devon síðasta sunnudagsmorgun ásamt öðru fólki í selaverndunarfélaginu Seal Project þegar hann varð vitni að árásinni.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The seal made an attempt to get the fishing line," he said.
output: „Selurinn reyndi að komast í veiðilínuna,“ sagði hann.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The angler finished his beer, drained the bottle and threw it at the seal.
output: „Stangveiðimaðurinn teygaði bjórinn, tæmdi flöskuna og kastaði henni í selinn.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"The bottle hit the seal on the back and it swam off."
output: „Flaskan lenti á baki selsins og hann synti á brott.“

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
Mr Kenny said that "fortunately seals are robust creatures," but said the seal was simply doing what was in its nature.
output: Kenni sagði að „sem betur fer væru selir sterkbyggð dýr“ en að selurinn hefði einfaldlega verið að gera það sem væri honum eðlislægt.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
"By throwing a glass bottle at it you are stopping it from hunting," he said.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
The Seal Project said it was "not an isolated case" and it had received "numerous reports of this aggressive behaviour recently."
output: Seal Project-félagið sagði að þetta væri „ekki einstakt tilvik“ og að það hefði nýverið fengið „margar tilkynningar um þessa árásargjörnu hegðun“.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Icelandic:
